Text:
...And after a full day of tracking down an internet access issue while standing on one leg - STFM will get this "joke" - I finally managed to get things up and running. Which means two things:

1) I'll be seeding this for a week. All hail Mothra for another classic collection upload!

2) If you have one of those "plug-n-pray" ethernet-capable mini-servers - the ones based on that Creation of Satan, "Linux", then force it to take a VERY high fixed IP address, a number that a home network of less than 8 systems wouldn wind up hanging the wireless hub on - like a number above .100.

Headache = On.
sorry to hear about those internet issues!  Glad everything is running fine now though!
